All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    deleteHandler
    Handler for all database delete functions.
    imageHandler
    The imageHandler class is a class designed to allow for handling of images taken by the user and saved This class allows for converting to a bitmap and correctly rotating the image.
    leaderboardActivity
    Activity responsible for showing all leaderboards Has 3 leaderboards available If opened with the intent passing a "user" extra the leaderboard will open for the provided username, otherwise it opens for the logged in user If opened with the intent passing a "leaderboard" extra (either "userScore", "userScans", or "qrScore") the leaderboard will automatically open the respective leaderboard
    locationHandler
    Handler class for getting the devices current location
    locations
    Class used to store location information of QR
    loginQRCodeGeneratorActivity
    Activity that shows the users login QR Code code referenced from: https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/how-to-generate-qr-code-in-android/
    loginQRScanActivity
    Activity for running and managing the camera used to scan QR Codes for logging in Code for camera usage and qr scanning referenced from: https://learntodroid.com/how-to-create-a-qr-code-scanner-app-in-android/
    LoginScreenActivity
    Activity for the user Log-in screen If opened with the intent containing extra "QR_Content" it will check if the extra is a valid login code and allow logging in as scanned user
    MainActivity
    Main Menu Activity, contains buttons to navigate to various sections of the app
    MapsActivity
    Activity for the QR Code map
    qrAddObjectPictureActivity
    Activity for running and managing the camera used when taking a picture of an object that was scanned
    QRCodeImageAnalyzer
    Class for analyzing frames of camera to check for QR Code, and decode QR Code Code is referenced from: https://learntodroid.com/how-to-create-a-qr-code-scanner-app-in-android/
    QRCodeListener
    Listener for scanning QR Codes
    QRcodeViewerActivity
    Activity that allows the viewing of any QR Code by providing the QR Code ID through Intent
    qrDatabaseAddHandler
    qrDatabaseAddHandler is a handler class used for adding Images, Comments and QR codes into the Firestore Database
    QRHistory
    This activity is used to display a selected users history of QR codes.
    qrScanCameraActivity
    Activity for running and managing the camera used to scan QR Codes Code for camera usage and qr scanning referenced from: https://learntodroid.com/how-to-create-a-qr-code-scanner-app-in-android/
    qrScannedGetInfoActivity
    Activity for getting all required information on a newly scanned QR Code Information gathered: Pictures, Location, Comment, Score, Hash
    Register
    Activity for registering a new user
    ScoringHandler
    Class for handling the hashing of QR Codes and the Scoring of QR Codes
    userHandler
    Class for handling user information
    userProfileViewerActivity
    This class is the activity responsible for viewing a user's profile It contains all the user's stats as well as button links to the users leaderboards and qr history
    userSearchActivity
    Activity for searching for another user by either username or scanning of QR code
    userSearchQRGeneratorActivity
    Activity for generating a user's search QR Code that can be scanned by another user to open the profile
    userSearchQRScanActivity
    Camera activity for scanning a users search QR code
